messages.messageContent:
Big chaos in the kibbutz.
Security issues.

Everyone is locked in their homes.
Not allowed to move around.
All over the country....

Special problem in Kfar Aza.
Very much so.

They infiltrated with paragliders
Currently on TV we see them on an open pickup truck shooting in the streets
This is a message from Sderot.

They are going to upload pictures from the fighting in Jewish settlements on WhatsApp
SystemCensor
. Don't open it, it will hack your phone within 10 seconds and can't be stopped in any way.
Pass the information to family and friends
They talked about it on TV. A cyber attack against us is also starting from various directions.

Hello everyone. I spoke with SystemCensor and there's room for everyone in Shefayim and I arranged transportation.
Whoever is interested, let me know so I can inform SystemCensor
SystemCensor
SystemCensor
SystemCensor
SystemCensor

Our dear friends.
This is the hardest day in our family's life
We lost those dearest to us.
SystemCensor our beloved were found dead in their home.
The sons SystemCensor are missing.
The destroyed kibbutz, physically and emotionally shattered, will never be the same again.
We're all 'on the edge'
The quality group we travel with is one big united family. Love and support without limits.
Our resilience and togetherness will help us get through the hours, days, weeks, and months in the best way possible.
Huge thanks to SystemCensor and Briza company, without you we couldn't finish this surreal journey where 33 people were saved from hell and got their lives back
We love you
SystemCensor
SystemCensor you've moved us. Tears are flowing for everyone. We'll hug you as much as we can. I believe I speak for everyone.

Thank you.
For us this is a holocaust.
There are no words, no consolation... We'll continue to stand by your side wherever you are - with you with all our hearts!!!
The heart aches so much.

SystemCensor our hearts are broken with you.
We'll do everything to continue being a united community and we'll hug and support you and all the friends and members of the community.
SystemCensor there are no words, just pain. Thinking of you

SystemCensor
Good and beloved people,
We are with you and for you.
The heart aches, the soul cries,
The mind can't comprehend.
It's crazy....
We'll help and hug in any way possible.
We love you.
Be strong.🙏
The heart aches be strong SystemCensor
I love you..with all my heart...

SystemCensor
Beloved and dear ones
Always with you and for you.
Be strong.
Dear SystemCensor
Dear SystemCensor
Be strong
We are with you and for you.🙏

SystemCensor we are hurting with you the blow and break that hit you.
We are also hurting the pain of SystemCensor and also the pain of SystemCensor and our hearts are broken with you.

Dear SystemCensor, I share in your grief and sorrow. Strengthening you on such a difficult day. Hope and believe that you will have the strength and mental resources to cope with the unimaginable loss.

SystemCensor. The last days were days of sadness and anger and helplessness in the face of hatred.
We hug and love you and hope and pray that the sons will return. 🙏

Good evening SystemCensor dear friends... We came here 23 years ago and we are grateful for every moment we are in your company. Here we grew up with SystemCensor here grew these wonderful children. And with the SystemCensor family and in the blink of an eye we were brutally cut off and lost our loved ones.. SystemCensor and SystemCensor who are defined as missing.. Thank you wonderful group.. Thank you for the support, acceptance and love. Thank you SystemCensor who does everything gently, understandingly and pleasantly and to SystemCensor the wonderful trip you are all wonderful people thank you for being with us in this difficulty hug to all of us... SystemCensor

My arsenal of words has dried up in the face of all this horror, in the face of the loss of young lives, only the great love for all of you remains and the belief that only our life force, the resilience of togetherness and doing good can overcome evil. Hugging all of you.

SystemCensor family
SystemCensor family
My heart is with you and the eyes don't stop tearing. Simply hell on earth be strong. I'm here for you whenever you ask. May you be comforted from heaven.

Thank you very much SystemCensor.
It's very hard for us.
It's indescribable.

SystemCensor family
We have just gone through 24 hours of waiting for hope with you and unfortunately you were informed of the worst disaster. SystemCensor and I hug and strengthen your hearts and cry together with you, your disaster is heavy and multiplied sevenfold, you have lost two amazing children and beloved and successful grandchildren and an exemplary family, and life is not as it was yesterday, and yet you are strong families and you have children and grandchildren who will not leave you and we are with you all the time, for any help you ask. Be strong, we love you.
SystemCensor

SystemCensor family and SystemCensor family
I simply don't know what to say. I believe these moments are about sending sincere condolences. Accept our condolences.
SystemCensor.

Information we just received SystemCensor
There is identification of SystemCensor and one of the girls. Probably SystemCensor but not sure.
Can't find SystemCensor and 3 children.
Defined by the army as missing.
Maybe we have a slight glimmer of hope here.
It's hard for us.
Keeping fingers crossed
Keeping "fingers" crossed for you!!!

Of course we're taking the information with extreme caution.
Everything is open.
Be strong and courageous!!!
I wish our prayers would be answered and they would be found healthy
From me too.

For us, until there is iron-clad information everything is questionable.
I wish.
Hoping for the best

It's even hard for me to say with God's help SystemCensor
Let's hope.
Sending all of you strength to cope, even with the uncertainty.

Update SystemCensor,
SystemCensor was apparently not murdered she ran when the terrorists entered the house SystemCensor found her crying on the path and brought her to their house.
SystemCensor and the children were taken captive and apparently SystemCensor is with them.
Let's pray🙏🙏🙏

Keeping fingers crossed and hoping for good news. Be strong SystemCensor
SystemCensor
